phrases: What Lies on the Opposite Shore
After the third day of the new year, my health was restored.
A few days passed since I came back home.
Has the air conditioner always been this loud?
Has the clock always been so noisy?
But I cannot meet eyes with it.
I know it, but I must not think that name.
I will be dealt a blow that tears up my insides.
I will not be able to move again.
Why did not I buy more?
I bet it is freezing outside.
Your cold would come roaring back.
Once you sit under it, you cannot leave.
When you are under it, it really warms you up,
but it is three times as cold when you get up.
You know it, but you cannot stay away from it, huh?
After all, it is so warm.
Their house is like a kotatsu.
When I am inside, it is so warm and comfortable, I almost melt.
But when I leave, I realize the daily life I was fine with before
is actually freezing cold, and I am painfully reminded of that.
If I think deeply about it, I get so scared that my whole body gets the chills.
I do not know, but I have to think.
First, sort out the current situation.
Right now, if I stop thinking and stand still, I will be stalemated.
I have three more rank-deciding matches this season.
At the moment, I have four wins and three losses.
I cannot rise in rank this season,
but I need to get back on track, and connect that with next year.
The only thing I am continuously winning through is coming next week.
The Lion King Tournament: the qualifier tournament.
For now, I need to focus on that.
If the number of my victories decrease,
I will eventually lose my place, just like that.
It is the shogi tournament sponsored by the biggest newspaper in Japan.
This and the Master Tournament are the two major title-tournaments.
The tournament has six groups of players, split according
to their records from the previous year.
The top-ranking players of each class can participate in the main tournament.
Because it has such huge sponsors, the scale is much bigger than other shogi tournaments
and it gets a lot of media attention.
So of course, this raises the spirits of the players, too.
But what gets the shogi players even more excited is...
The Lion King Tournament sure fires you up!
In golf, it would be the Japan Open!
In tennis, it would be the YOU.S. Open!
So let us get some, Kiriyama!
My opponent is Takeshi Tsujii, 9th dan.
three clauses and Santa Claus sound similar, do not they?
Icy... roses are beautiful, you know?
He is a shogi player with strong offensive power...
But the most amazing thing is that even while cracking lame jokes, he plays a strong game.
As expected from a 9th dan, Rank A for eight years!
To kill a man on Kilimanjaro.
I really do not want to lose!
I do not want to lose!
He is bringing out the bishop?
It may or may not be.
It is nagging at me, but...
if I use my Bishop to take his Silver, his Gold will take my Bishop.
That knight could be mine too?
I have to take his knight here, right?
Even if I sacrifice my Bishop, I will get his Knight and Silver in exchange.
Plus my Rook will become a dragon.
It is like my mentor said.
Women may betray you, but stolen pieces never will.
Well, that is what would happen.
So for now, I will pull my dragon back...
If I take the 2-g-Pawn, my Dragon would do it.
Take it Do not take it
If I do not take it...
His move, 2-h-Bishop, and that is bad for me!
No wait... is this already over?
And something is stabbing me in the back?
You died at 2h, while holding Knight and Silver.
But are not you guys in the middle of your own match?
I was also at the end of an intense, quagmire-filled rendezvous.
I narrowly got a win on the 187th move.
Looks like I drew... my own draw.
I wish I could say that, but today, you sealed the deal...
Sealed... sealed the ceiling seal deal?
Special Match Room Takao Lion King Tournament Lion King Tournament
I mean, that old dude is pretty scary.
I do not know what it is, but he is got a yakuza aura.
Just sitting in front of him makes you make mistakes.
What Lies on the Opposite Shore
If we keep going like this, you and I will go head to head.
Well, I am looking forward to that.
It should be a little more interesting than beating you with my bare hands.
I want you to pass on a message to your old man, Kouda.
It is about that stalker girl.
Tell him to get her off my back.
Gotou gave it to me recently.
As for you, Mr. Gotou, if there is something you want to say, please tell Mr. Kouda directly.
New people like him are vulnerable.
Is somebody still on the 4th floor?
Please do not take your fish out here!
Geez, at a time like this, another troublemaker.
He is like, what, a heavyweight?
If he is crude oil, I am salad oil.
Did something happen between you and Gotou?
He was saying some ominous things.
Hey, the tackle master is here!
I am not seeing any smiles!
How about some sashimi and hot sake?
Some people are still in their match!
Bring some bags you can put fish in!
Also, tell everyone from Modern Shogi downstairs to come up!
A bachelor probably cannot handle 40 fish.
What is the deal with the teardrop sunglasses?
I thought it was some old hipster.
Please introduce me to a woman who will fillet fish, Chairman.
Mr. Gotou should have taken some home.
Since he is a married man...
His wife's still in the hospital.
Are these all the bags we have?
Then I will take these bluish ones...
It was popular, supposed to be good for the brain.
I will eat this and come up with countermeasures against Gotou.
Oh, I would better head out, too.
I heard from the owner at Bar Misaki.
It seems you have been enjoying the hospitality of her beautiful niece at that house lately?
You should keep that a secret.
There are plenty of our association's members who are head-over-heels for her.
If she is taking care of you, why do not you bring her some?
The owner proudly said she is a good cook.
He loaded me down with fish.
Filleting them will probably be a real chore.
What if this just becomes a burden to her?
When I am inside, it is so warm and comfortable,
This house is like a kotatsu.
I am scared that I will never be able to leave again.
That is why I thought to stay away for a while.
I will fillet the rockfish into three, fry them up, and have them for tomorrow's lunch.
I will slice the sardines into anchovies and save them for pizza and pasta!
I will fillet the flounder into five pieces, split it into salted fish and sashimi...
How many days of food expenses will we save from this?
We got extravagant for New Year's, so she told us to be frugal for a while.
But now we can have delicious food from tomorrow!
Miso soup with cabbage and deep-fried tofu.
Those are the leftovers, so I hope that is okay.
Sorry we do not have anything.
Do not say you do not have anything!
It is just seasoned with an egg and soy sauce, so how can it be this good?
In a wide- mouthed pot, a pack of soba-tea is inside
But I am glad you got over your cold, Rei.
Your nasal voice has finally gone away.
Thank you for everything you did for me over the holidays!
Can you sleep with Momo tonight?
You know what, the old lady next door gave us a jigsaw puzzle!
Let us solve it tomorrow in the kotatsu!
I have to go home tonight.
A home like a warm kotatsu.
I have got a match coming up that I just cannot lose.
So I have to go home and study.
It is a test where I show my opponent and myself how hard I have been trying.
Then you have something to tell Rei.
Um, Rei says he has a test.
So what do you say at a time like this?
First, Mr. Smith goes up against Gotou,
eliciting a shriek from the harp bridge.
That time, I could not do anything as he beat me up.
And I could not even give him a scratch.
But I will not be his punching bag on the shogi board.
Actually, Brother, I hope you split Kiriyama's head in half.
Is this a show of confidence?
March Comes in Like a Lion.
It is like, you cannot miss the next episode, you know?
